metadata.title: CVE-2022-43358 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Stack overflow vulnerability in ast_selectors.cpp: in functionSass::ComplexSelector::has_placeholder in libsass:3.6.5-8-g210218, whichcan be exploited by attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS).

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
